snippet: This season, the emphasis is on black, with lace and organza that simultaneously veil the body and reveal it.
abstract: Fashion this season features lots of black, lace and organza inspired by somber mourning frocks worn by 19th-century Victorian-era widows.
lead_paragraph: This season, the emphasis is on black, with lace and organza that simultaneously veil the body and reveal it.

headline.main: The Romantic Drama of the Victorian Era
